name: AgileBen JIRA Filter Forecaster
description: Adds an Analyse button to Jira filters.  Uses python and bokeh library to do charting and forecasting.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval' http://127.0.0.1:3000; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://*.atlassian.net;
